import sys
import heapq

num = int(sys.stdin.readline())
v = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
heapq.heapify(v)

for i in range(num-1):
    x = heapq.heappop(v)
    y = heapq.heappop(v)
    heapq.heappush(v, int((x + y) / 2))

print(v[0])

def main():
    num_ingredient = int(input())
    ingredient = list(map(int, input().split()))
    ingredient.sort()

    while len(ingredient) > 1:
        ingredient[0] = (ingredient[0] + ingredient[1]) // 2
        ingredient.pop(1)
        ingredient.sort()

    print(ingredient[0])

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
#!/usr/bin/env python3

import sys
import heapq

num = int(sys.stdin.readline())
v = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
heapq.heapify(v)

for i in range(num-1):
    x = heapq.heappop(v)
    y = heapq.heappop(v)
    heapq.heappush(v, (x+y)//2)

print(v[0])

def main(): 
    num_ingredient = int(input())
    ingredient = list(map(int, input().split()))
    ingredient.sort()

    while len(ingredient) > 1:
        ingredient[0] = (ingredient[0] + ingredient[1]) / 2
        ingredient.pop(1)
        ingredient.sort()

    print(ingredient[0])

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
